subject: All Star Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Prince Fielder’s two young sons shadowed him at the All-Star Game the way he used to shadow his father, Cecil, when he was young. The two men had a falling out in 2004.
snippet: Prince Fielder’s two young sons shadowed him at the All-Star Game the way he used to shadow his father, Cecil, when he was young. The two men had a falling out in 2004.
